hero.title: Expert Printing Solutions for Your Brand
hero.subtitle: From custom apparel to unique packaging, we bring your vision to life with precision and quality.

fastDelivery.title: Fast Delivery
fastDelivery.description: Swift turnaround times to meet your deadlines.

customDesign.title: Custom Design
customDesign.description: Bring your unique vision to life with personalized prints.

expertSupport.title: Expert Support
expertSupport.description: Dedicated assistance online or by phone.

about.title: About Us
about.text1: We are a dedicated team passionate about delivering exceptional print quality. For over a decade, PRINT.CO has been the trusted partner for businesses seeking reliable and creative solutions in digital, screen, and specialized printing techniques. We combine technical expertise with a commitment to sustainable practices.
about.text2: Our focus is on providing a seamless experience, from initial design consultation to final delivery, ensuring every project meets our high standards and exceeds your expectations.

sublimation.title: Sublimation
sublimation.description: High-quality printing on textiles and merchandise with vibrant colors.
sublimation.text: Sublimation printing is a digital printing method that uses heat to transfer dye onto materials like fabric, plastic, and paper. It's ideal for custom apparel, promotional products, and personalized gifts, offering full-color, durable, and fade-resistant designs without a heavy feel.

diffusion.title: Diffusion Printing
diffusion.description: Specialized printing for complex materials and unique visual effects.
diffusion.text: Diffusion printing involves using specialized inks that penetrate deeper into the material's fibers, creating a soft, integrated print that becomes part of the fabric itself. This method is particularly suitable for achieving unique visual textures and a luxurious feel on high-end textiles.
list: Soft, natural drape of fabric preserved
Ideal for delicate and high-end materials
Unique depth and texture in designs

screenPrinting.title: Screen Printing
screenPrinting.description: Durable, long-lasting, and dense printing, ideal for large volumes.
screenPrinting.text: Screen printing is a versatile printing technique where a mesh is used to transfer ink onto a substrate, except in areas made impermeable to the ink by a blocking stencil. A blade or squeegee is moved across the screen to fill the open mesh apertures with ink, and a reverse stroke then causes the screen to touch the substrate momentarily along a line of contact.
list: Wide range of ink types (metallics, glow-in-the-dark)

logoTags.title: Logo Tags
logoTags.description: Design and printing of textile and cardboard tags featuring your brand.
logoTags.text: We offer comprehensive solutions for custom logo tags, including design, material selection (textile, cardboard, leatherette), and printing. Our tags enhance your brand's professionalism and provide essential product information. From elegant woven labels to robust printed cardboard tags, we ensure quality and brand consistency.
list: Variety of materials: textile, cardboard, synthetic

packaging.title: Cardboard Packaging
packaging.description: Creation and printing of customized, stylish cardboard packaging.
packaging.text: Our cardboard packaging services go beyond just boxes. We design and produce custom packaging that reflects your brand's aesthetics and protects your products. Utilizing various printing techniques and finishing options, we create packaging that stands out, from minimalist designs to complex, multi-color solutions.
list: High-quality printing on various cardboard types
